column5: If anyone knows where I can get maps of lakes/reservoirs in Saskatchewan I'd really appreciate it. Thanks.Kris

There is a gov office that has all the maps you need, located in Regina. I don't know their current adress, as they have moved, but I am sure that the phone number can be found on the fishing guide.You can download the guide off of the internet - try a search with"Saskatchewan anglers guide"Good luck
